scripts.install-project: cd client && npm i && npm audit fix && cd ../server && npm i && npm audit fix
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm i && npm audit fix && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run copy-client-files-to-dist
scripts.copy-client-files-to-dist: cd client && cp -r build ../dist && rm -r build && cd ../dist && mv build client
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm i && npm audit fix && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run copy-server-files-to-dist
scripts.copy-server-files-to-dist: cd server && cp -r package.json ../dist && cp -r node_modules ../dist
scripts.postinstall: npm run create-dist-folder && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && rm -r client && rm -r server
